```{r}
planets <- vroom("the+planets.csv")
num_planets <- nrow(planets)
num_variables <- ncol(planets)

numerical_vars <- sapply(planets, is.numeric)
all_numerical <- all(numerical_vars)

if (num_planets == 736 && num_variables == 8 && all_numerical) {
  message <- "Data loaded successfully. All checks passed."
} else {
  message <- "Error in loading data or data checks failed."
}
cat(message)
```
